summary: Phoebe and a fellow American in Rome find a dog with a $5000 reward. They take a train to the owner in Monte Carlo. She turns up murdered. They run and become suspects just as 3 other Americans on the train.
cast: John Candy|Jim Belushi|Cybill Shepherd|Sean Young|Richard Lewis|Ornella Muti|Giancarlo Giannini|George Hamilton|Roberto Sbaratto|Joss Ackland|Ann Way|Geoffrey Andrews|Caterina Boratto|Elsa Martinelli|Riccardo Parisio Perrotti|Nino Richelmy|Mario De Candia|Giuseppe Perruccio|Alessandro Amen|Franco Angrisano|Georges Carlo|Benedetto Fanna|Christian Bianchi|Marco Martinozzi|Charles Dubourgeot|Eugene Levy
title: SÃ³lo falta el asesino
